ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: The original idea was a Bard Performance skill, the argument degraded to the statement I would not like a skill where all that was done, was pushing a button
ygData.messageBody:
The original idea was a Bard Performance skill, the argument degraded to the
statement "I would not like a skill where all that was done, was pushing a
button for a few copper or something of the sort, I was just stating that if
that was the case then the person in question who made that statement would
not like a rogue, who's pickpocket skills are much like that....
-----Original Message-----
From: SpudSucker <sprite@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 11:50 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard petition ideas (Long)


>From: "SpudSucker" <sprite@...>
>
>>From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>>
>>Then you would obviously never play a rogue.........
>
>
>What brought this up? I was replying about Bards, not Rogues.
>-Sprite
